testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to access holiday data for staff members via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/holidayList endpoint with invalid authorization credentials,
testcase.failure:
* The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayList" path parameters.......................passed * The API user sends a GET request and records the response from the api refundReasonList endpoint..failed * The api user verifies that the status code is 401.........................skipped * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "Unauthenticated".skipped
